channel.title: Help With Custom Cursors

item.title: Help With Custom Cursors
item.dc:creator: @I_Kampy_I I Kampy I
item.description:
@I_Kampy_I wrote:

Alrighty then, I have a problem, i want custom cursors. I have this code for them.
This is the code for the command.(possibly)

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("HP")) { Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Image image = toolkit.getImage("./Cursors/HP.cur"); Point hotSpot = new Point(0,0); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(image, hotSpot, "HP"); frame.setCursor(cursor); }
This is what is in the menu code area.(possibly)

for (String name : cursorsButtons) { JMenuItem menuItem = new JMenuItem(name); if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("-")) cursorsMenu.addSeparator(); else { cursorsMenu.add(menuItem); menuItem.addActionListener(this); } }

The problem is when i click HP in the drop menu the cursor disappears, although i can still click on stuff, i canâ€™t see cursor. The picture for the cursor is a .cur file. Could that possibly be the problem?

Read full topic
